item.title: Building a minecraft server on a single board computer
item.description: What better during a worldwide pandemic that to get together with your friends on minecraft? Now, if only the server was free...
item.author: lori.barto@live.it (Lorenzo Bartolini)

item.title: About this site - part 1
item.description: Come this winter, I wanted to find a place to both show off all the cool tricks I learn and write short blog stories talking about my experiences. I remembered I had a website that I only had been using to test npm packages in a production setting, and I decided to do something with it.
item.author: lori.barto@live.it (Lorenzo Bartolini)
